
Wood Structure Analysis Results (Dataset 5)
===========================================

1. Design Strength Values:
Bending strength (fm,d): 16.62 MPa
Tensile strength (ft,0,d): 9.85 MPa
Compressive strength (fc,0,d): 13.54 MPa

2. Load Analysis:
Characteristic total load: 2.10 kN/m²
Design load: 2.71 kN/m²

3. Rafter Forces:
Rafter length: 3.75 m
Maximum moment: 4.58 kNm
Axial force: 17.04 kN

4. Purlin Forces:
Purlin load: 2.99 kN/m
Maximum moment: 0.45 kNm

5. Thermal Performance Analysis:
Surface Resistances:
Internal surface resistance (R_si): 0.100 m²·K/W
External surface resistance (R_se): 0.040 m²·K/W

Layer Properties:

Steel tile roofing:
  Thickness: 0.6 mm
  Thermal conductivity: 50.000 W/m·K
  Thermal resistance: 0.000 m²·K/W
  Density: 7850 kg/m³

C27 timber structure:
  Thickness: 100.0 mm
  Thermal conductivity: 0.130 W/m·K
  Thermal resistance: 0.769 m²·K/W
  Density: 370 kg/m³

Mineral wool insulation:
  Thickness: 200.0 mm
  Thermal conductivity: 0.040 W/m·K
  Thermal resistance: 5.000 m²·K/W
  Density: 20 kg/m³

Total thermal resistance: 5.91 m²·K/W
Overall U-value: 0.17 W/m²·K

6. Ultimate Limit State Verification:
Bending stress: 9.53 MPa
Compressive stress: 1.42 MPa
Utilization ratio: 0.68
Passes ULS: Yes

7. Serviceability Limit State Verification:
Instantaneous deflection: 5.80 mm
Final deflection: 10.44 mm
Limit L/300: 12.48 mm
Passes SLS: Yes

8. Column Buckling Analysis:
Slenderness ratio: 43.30
Relative slenderness: 0.60
Buckling factor kc: 0.917
Design strength: 12.41 MPa
Actual stress: 0.43 MPa
Utilization ratio: 0.03
Passes buckling check: Yes
